channel.title: typed on ThingsDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in typed on ThingsDB documentation

item.title: to_thing
item.description: Converts a typed thing into a thing. This function can only be used if the type of the typed thing is not required by any other type (including a self dependency). If the type is dependent by another type, then ThingsDB has no way to tell if it is allowed to do the conversion. This function generates a change. Function typed-thing.to_thing() Arguments None Return value Returns nil when successful. Example This code converts a typed thing to a thing:
